text: Kamaghɨn amizɨ, amizim nguibar ekiamɨn ghua uan nɨghnɨzir aghuim gumazamiziba bar me mɨgei. Ezɨ me an nɨghnɨzimɨn gɨn ghua, Seban fɨrim atugha an dapanim isa dɨvazimɨn azenan, Joap bagh anekuni. Ezɨ Joap sɨgham givima an mɨdorozir gumaziba nguibar ekiam ategha vaghvagha uamategha uan nguibabar zui. Ezɨ Joap Atrivim Devit bagha uamategha Jerusalemɨn ghu.
